regularnode

Class FailureListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • regularnode.FailureListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class FailureListener
extends java.lang.Thread
    Listens for messages: message sent by the user to name the current node as the new admin node message sent by the new admin node to announce it's presence
